feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 5:54 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
